title: space in teemos name

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: push the e's in teemo together please

replies.body:
Hiya Neoplayer2, 

Thanks for the report!

There (contrary to popular belief) isn't a space, and this is a result of poor kerning in the load screen. It also occurs on other champions and skins. IIRC, Talon is a good example. This is something that we're aware of, but isn't of very high priority at this time, as it doesn't affect gameplay, and is something we'd categorize as trivial.  This issue would be something we'd need to fix systemically, so it wouldn't be a quick fix.
